entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Kingdom Rush Vengeance TD
entry.summary: Pirate Kings Campaign!: â‚º499,99 â†’ â‚º399,99
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Pirate Kings Campaign!ï¼šâ‚º499,99 â†’ â‚º399,99 [â‚º349,99 ~ â‚º499,99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º249,99

In-App Purchases

  • Hero Beresadï¼šâ‚º399,99
  • Hammerhold Campaign!ï¼šâ‚º399,99
  • Tower Blazing Gemï¼šâ‚º249,99
  • Mega Tower Bundleï¼šâ‚º899,99
  • Hero Jack'O Lanternï¼šâ‚º149,99
  • Hero Mortemisï¼šâ‚º149,99
  • Tower Deep Devil's Reefï¼šâ‚º149,99
  • Tower Grim Cemeteryï¼šâ‚º149,99
  • Pirate Kings Campaign!ï¼šâ‚º399,99

Application Description

Get ready to jump into action and show the Kingdom whoâ€™s the real boss in the best tower defense game! Face empires of mighty enemies. Clash against supreme bosses, unlocking and switching to new towers. Train legendary heroes and get all the achievements using your strategy in this amazing TD game. Kingdom Rush Vengeance will give you hours and hours of gameplay in the best tower defense game available! Heroes, your Army, Enemies and legendary td bossfights! - 17 Powerful HEROES who will, without hesitation, rush into action at your command - LEVEL UP YOUR HEROES and upgrade their abilities - 10+ TRINKETS AND ARTEFACTS for that extra action in battle. - NEW POWERS AND REINFORCEMENTS to vanquish your foes, td style! - 30 UPGRADES to train your army to their best form. - 60+ DEADLY ENEMIES that will put all of your wit and strategic skills to the test - RUSH TO SAVE THE KINGDOM as you bring down 6 mighty bosses in the most legendary boss fights! Epic Selection of Towers and Upgrades - 22 NEW TOWERS to defend your kingdom - UNIQUE ABILITIES AND SPECIAL POWER for every tower - Choose your arsenal of towers and execute your strategy. Create devastating combinations of towers, abilities and special powers to stop your enemies! Near Endless Tower Defense Gameplay - 42 CHALLENGING STAGES that will test your skills - 9 DIFFERENT REALMS to conquer and explore - EXPLORE new lands in the Kingdom - 60+ ACHIEVEMENTS, hidden secrets, and fun stuff for you to play and discover while you explore the realm! - UNLOCK HEROIC AND IRON CHALLENGES on all stages - CASUAL, NORMAL, VETERAN OR IMPOSSIBLE difficulty for every level - Summon enemy waves faster to earn additional gold Time for some Royal Vengeance in the Kingdom! Vezâ€™nan, the powerful almighty wizard has returned. Lead your powerful dark army and make the Kingdom tremble with each step. Help Vezâ€™nan conquer new lands in the kingdom! Orcs, goblins, demons, dark knights, zombies and many more! Choose your favorites and mix them to find the most deadly tower defense combination - secure the crown of the kingdom for Vezâ€™nan. Awesome Offline Tower Defense Game No Wi-Fi at your Dark Tower? - PLAY ANYWHERE - playing offline works, if your wifi doesnâ€™t - PLAY OFFLINE - no internet connection required - You can play Kingdom Rush Vengeance as your offline TD game of choice. -------------------------------------------------- HEARD ON THE MEDIA: "For veteran Kingdom Rush players and newcomers alike, the charm and strategy of the franchise remains with Kingdom Rush: Vengeance, making it one of the best mobile games of 2018!" -Polygon "Kingdom Rush Vengeance is the biggest and baddest the series has been." -148Apps "Players with any affinity for tower-defense games are going to enjoy every second they spend with Kingdom Rush Vengeance!" -Pocket gamer "The game is intensely engaging with a light-hearted tone that makes it a real pleasure to jump into." -Pocket tactics Get Lord Vezâ€™nanâ€™s latest news here: https://www.kingdomrushvengeance.com/ Terms and Conditions: https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService Privacy Policy: https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy Video creators, podcast creators, and streamers: We would love to see your content on Youtube and Twitch! We support and promote channel creators so, if you want us to showcase your videos or want to know more about our games, feel free to write to us to contact@ironhidegames.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: MagicKit Pro: AI Smart Toolbox
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º199,99 â†’ Free [Free ~ â‚º199,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

Application Description

MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life. Device and System Tools â€¢ Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state â€¢ Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage â€¢ Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details â€¢ Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running â€¢ Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage â€¢ Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space â€¢ Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries â€¢ RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance â€¢ Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance Network Tools â€¢ Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed â€¢ Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status â€¢ IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses â€¢ Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude Security & Privacy Tools â€¢ Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options â€¢ Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases â€¢ UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats â€¢ Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options â€¢ Temporary Email: Create disposable email addresses for privacy protection Utility Tools â€¢ Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements â€¢ Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies â€¢ Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support â€¢ Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status â€¢ Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events â€¢ Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks â€¢ QR Scanner: Scan QR codes instantly â€¢ Document & Card Scanner: Capture and save high-quality document scans with AI-powered text recognition â€¢ Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors â€¢ Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app â€¢ Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone â€¢ Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session â€¢ Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness â€¢ Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup â€¢ Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more â€¢ Color Palettes Studio: Create, extract, and manage beautiful color palettes from images or manually using color pickers â€” perfect for designers and creatives Highlights â€¢ Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools â€¢ Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities â€¢ No ads or in-app purchases â€¢ Lightweight and battery-efficient â€¢ Compatible with all iOS devices â€¢ Frequent updates with new tools â€¢ Built with privacy and performance in mind â€¢ Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations Perfect for â€¢ Device monitoring and optimization â€¢ Everyday measurement and conversion tasks â€¢ Scanning documents and QR codes â€¢ Cleaning up photo storage and contacts â€¢ Creating and managing countdowns with reminders â€¢ Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters â€¢ Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control â€¢ Performing simple network diagnostics â€¢ Generating secure passwords and managing privacy â€¢ Taking quick notes and organizing information â€¢ Designing and managing color palettes for creative projects Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.

entry.title: Neo Monsters
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º49,99 â†’ Free [Free ~ â‚º49,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • 13 Gemsï¼šâ‚º399,99
  • 1 Gemï¼šâ‚º49,99
  • 6 Gemsï¼šâ‚º199,99
  • 48 Gemsï¼šâ‚º1.499,99
  • 74 Gemsï¼šâ‚º2.299,99
  • 150 Gemsï¼šâ‚º3.999,99
  • 28 Gemsï¼šâ‚º799,99

Application Description

Become a Legend! Capture over 2000 Animated Monsters and Duel in Real-Time PvP! Form your team and battle for victory! Capture, train, and evolve to become the champion in one of the biggest monster battling RPGs! Neo Monsters is an addictive strategy RPG that features epic 4v4 battles between two teams of up to 16 monsters. The unique turn-based battle system allows you to come up with powerful chain strategies by combining hundreds of abilities. Hunt down the strongest monsters and harness their power, then take the battle online to dominate in exciting PvP battles and leagues! Are you ready to take the challenge? â–¶Features: â— Build your Monster Collection â€¢ Capture and evolve over 1000 fully animated monsters! â€¢ Train your monsters and unleash their deadly potential. â€¢ Collect evolution ingredients to create the ultimate power! â— Form a Battle Strategy â€¢ Build the ultimate team of up to 16 monsters. â€¢ Defeat your opponents in epic turn-based 4v4 battles! â€¢ Create devastating combinations from hundreds of abilities. â— Become the Champion â€¢ Conquer six Leagues and take on the Grand Champion in 60+ hours of adventure! â€¢ Explore multiple islands and dungeons on your journey. â€¢ Follow the story to uncover the truth behind your late uncleâ€™s atrocity. â— Take the Battle Online â€¢ Duel players from around the world in PvP leagues! â€¢ Complete 100+ online missions. â€¢ Take on weekly updated events to unlock big rewards. Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NeoMonstersOfficial/ Join the Neo Monsters community: http://www.neomonstersforum.com/ Issues or questions? Contact our support: neomonsupport.gameplay@zigzagame.net Terms of Service: https://www.zigzagame.com/terms/ Privacy Policy: https://www.zigzagame.com/privacy-policy/

Application Description

â€» Introduction Defeat all invaders to defend your dungeon! Collect more weapons and monsters to make them stronger. Enjoy various contents such as "dungeon building, collect various weapons, achievements" â€» Story In order to defend the last remaining dungeon of this world, you became a guardian. Heroes from all over the world gather to conquer the dungeon. Never be defeated, be the best dungeon! â€» Characteristics of game â—ˆ Enjoy "Retro graphics & Sounds". â—ˆ Easy to play, anyone can enjoy it easily. â—ˆ Please enjoy the pleasure by sweeping away enemies. â—ˆ Organize a variety of mercenaries and find synergies. â—ˆ Rewards are waiting for each achievement. I am a solo developer. Your download and feedback is so precious to me. If you have fun, please recommend it to the people around you. -SUPPORT- E-Mail : support@gamecoaster.com Tel :+82 10-4178-0283 @ GameCoaster * In-app Payment lets you use features or characters immediately. However, you can enjoy all of the content without IAP. :)

  • Uniform Packï¼šâ‚º199,99
  • Unlock Baphometï¼šâ‚º149,99

Application Description

The new game of the developer ""GameCoaster"", who made Dungeon Maker and Dungeon Defense! A seemingly infinite stream of heroes invaded the dungeon and brought ruin to the Abyss. Now you must go straight to the source of the enemy and return your home to its former glory. Defeat the Army of Light and take back the power of the Abyss. You are tasked with infiltrating a planet dominated by light all on your own. You must bring down the heroes and use them to summon monsters to fight alongside you, armed with the equipment of these fallen sacrifices. Once you are strong enough, you may receive the blessings of the Dark Gods, and combine their powers with those of your monsters to bring down colossal groups of enemies. â—‡ 10 elite monsters and over 100 unique skills â—‡ The Power of the Abyss gets stronger as you rebuild â—‡ Roguelike with random choices and opportunities

Application Description

CatBox Todo is a to-do app loved by cat lovers worldwide. It's a brand-new, minimalist to-do list application featuring lively and adorable cats and themes. Design Concept CatBox aims to provide users with a comfortable experience by having lively kittens accompany them. The cats will perform various daily actions and provide touch feedback, encouraging users like little helpers. The to-do design emphasizes a realistic portrayal of daily life with an ultra-minimalist design, focusing on core functionality and minimizing distractions. Features â€¢ Lively Cat Companionship: Cats will vividly accompany you throughout your day, not only encouraging you when you complete tasks but also showcasing fun moments like eating and sleeping, just like your friends. â€¢ Clear and Concise To-Dos: Use CatBox Todo to record important matters simply and directly. â€¢ Quadrant View for Better Focus: Prioritize and focus on important tasks with the four-quadrant view. â€¢ Widget Support with Thematic Changes: CatBox Todo supports the latest widgets and will change along with the chosen theme. â€¢ Adorable Cat Skins: Lively and adorable cat skins are available through subscriptions and individual purchases. â€¢ iOS 26 Adaptability: Utilizes Apple Intelligence for iOS 26 compatibility. â€¢ Apple Intelligence runs entirely on-device, delivering enhanced cat AI while maximizing privacy. entry.content:

  • Little Tipï¼šâ‚º249,99

Application Description

Strongbox Pro is available here for outright and upfront purchase instead of via an In-App Purchase upgrade. This version of Strongbox is identical to the much loved Strongbox application with all the Pro features and the same regular update schedule. Strongbox is an application for keeping all your passwords safely stored and protected by one master password. Supporting the open source Password Safe and KeePass formats. *** Supports Family Sharing *** *** Features *** - Face ID/Touch ID Unlock for the ultimate in convenience, security and speed. - PIN Code Unlock with a Duress PIN option for those tricky situations. - Passkey support - The latest, most convenient and most secure authentication method (passkeys). - YubiKey protection - secure your databases with a hardware token. - Secure - protected by time tested military grade cryptography. - Private - Isolated In-App attachments viewer for your sensitive documents, photos & videos. - Audit your passwords - Automatically check your database for weak passwords including a 'Have I Been Pwned?' check. - Cloud Support, so you can access your cloud safes using iCloud, Dropbox, OneDrive, Google Drive, WebDAV or SFTP even when offline. Use the built in Files app for many other storage options or store them securely only on your local device. You choose your storage. - Search your entire set of passwords and secrets instantly and powerfully, with deep search. Autocomplete new entries, and auto generate secure passwords. - Compatible - Import/Export by Files app, Email, CSV, iTunes File Sharing or use cloud storage. - Standards compliant - using the time tested Password Safe and KeePass formats so you can import any existing password safe you have. - Features galore - Incredibly configurable password generation including Diceware (XKCD) & regular passwords. - Timed Auto Clear Clipboard. - Entry History. - KeePass Field References, Tags, Custom Icon & FavIcons (including automatic search & download). - Two Factor Authentication codes (TOTP) - QR Code, Steam & Manual. --------------------------------------------------------------------- â€¢ Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase â€¢ Strongbox Privacy Policy may be found here: https://strongboxsafe.com/privacy-policy/ â€¢ Strongbox Terms of Use may be found here: https://strongboxsafe.com/terms/

Application Description

SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES. BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck! In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age. Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now weâ€™re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile. â€¢ Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history. Cultist Simulator doesnâ€™t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time youâ€™ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees. â€¢ Intense, immersive narrative â€“ Combine cards to tell your own story. A hefty novelâ€™s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end. â€¢ A rich Lovecraftian world â€“ Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies. Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraftâ€™s tales to an entirely new setting. Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics... â€¢ The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal â€¢ The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened â€¢ The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit â€¢ The Exile - Some there are who will not yield If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on â€œContact usâ€ at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º49,99

Application Description

Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series. It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world. You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless. Story: A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins... Key Features: - Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world. - A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go? - A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition. And your life. - Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed. Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds. - Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

entry.title: This Is the Police 2
entry.content:

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º5,00

Application Description

IMPORTANT DOES NOT support: iPhone 5S, iPad Air, iPad Mini 2 & 3 and iPod Touch Interpret the law as you see fit in This Is the Police 2, sequel to the acclaimed noir drama This Is the Police! Run the sheriffâ€™s department, manage your cops, investigate, interrogate, and incarcerate. Make tough decisions â€“ and try to keep out of prison yourself! â€“ in this story-driven mixture of adventure, strategy, and turn-based tactical combat. Is it a simulation? A management game? A tactical challenge? A visual novel? A puzzle? Itâ€™s all of these, and more! Dive into one-of-a-kind -story-driven experience. Welcome to Sharpwood, a cold and harsh border town riven with violence, where no one is completely innocent. Smugglers, gangs, and screaming populists call this town their home. To maintain peace and order, the young sheriff Lilly Reed (Sarah Hamilton) will have to team up with fugitive criminal Jack Boyd (Jon St. John), and pray that her dangerous plan doesnâ€™t spiral out of control. Take charge of the Sheriffâ€™s department. Your subordinates arenâ€™t just some resource; they are living people with their own strengths, weaknesses, fears, and prejudices â€“ and you'll have to reckon with all of them in order to survive. Is one of your guys drinking too much? Or always coming up with excuses for not coming to work? Or does he refuse to follow orders? Youâ€™ll have to show a steady hand if you want to impose discipline on this department. Engage in tactical combat. During your most dangerous operations, the game will switch to turn-based combat. Gather a team of your finest cops. Carefully study the terrain, adapt your plans, stealthily approach your suspects and use non-lethal weapons and equipment â€“ if the situation allows. True, sometimes gunfights are almost impossible to avoid, but be careful: This Is the Police 2 doesnâ€™t have hit points. A single bullet can cost a cop their life. Become a true detective. Collect evidence, study case materials, interrogate suspects and send the criminals to court. And if the suspect was innocent? Perhaps it's time to find out if any Sharpwood judges can be bought. Thank you for playing â€˜THIS IS THE POLICE 2â€™! entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º49,99 â†’ Free [Free ~ â‚º229,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

Application Description

Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether youâ€™re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more! Key Features: Baseball Action Like Never Before: Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batterâ€™s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun! Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay: Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops! Collectible Doodle Characters: Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments. Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun: Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action! Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound: Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run. Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure. Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

Application Description

Bluff and raise, improve your skills, gain experience, make new friends and become the best poker player ever! â—† Game features â—† â€¢ FREE CHIPS â€“ Play the game every day to get free chips! â€¢ BOOST POKER TOURNAMENT â€“ A Texas Hold'em tournament where you spin the reel for a chance of winning 15 billion chips! Boost your balance with this incredibly exciting game! â€¢ SPECIAL MODES â€“ Play Texas Hold'em with a twist: make super combinations with jokers, peek at your opponent's cards, play high cards only, get pocket pairs and much more! â€¢ MTT TOURNAMENTS â€“ The most popular offline tournaments are now available online! Defeat lots of worthy competitors at several tables to reach the final table! â€¢ TOURNAMENTSÂ â€“ Participate in weekly Sit'n'Go tournaments, where you can WIN unique trophies or millions of chips and top our Leaderboard! â€¢ CASINO GAMES â€“ Enjoy a variety of casino games. Play blackjack, Omaha poker, roulette, baccarat, slots, video poker, craps, Split Bet Poker and Set Pokerâ€”all in one application! â€¢ VIP LEVELS â€“ Get huge bonuses and exclusive access to the latest in-game features! â€¢ FAIR PLAY GUARANTEEDÂ â€“ All our games use a Random Number Generator (RNG) and are certified by independent experts. We guarantee the best and fairest Texas Hold'em experience! â€¢ CHAT WITH OTHER PLAYERSÂ â€“ Have even more fun at the casino tables with our convenient in-game chat, instant messenger and animated emoji. Discuss the hands played or share your emotions with your poker opponents and friends! â€¢ REFERRAL SYSTEM â€“ Invite your friends to play, everyone will get a reward! â€¢ BUILD YOUR PROFILE â€“ Share your successes with friends. Show off how many games you've played, your biggest wins, level, card collections, achievements, property and trophies! â€¢ UNIQUE AVATAR â€“ Create a one-of-a-kind look in the avatar editor. â€¢ QUESTS â€“ Complete daily quests to get free chips! â€¢ EASY LEARN TO PLAY â€“ Are you new to Texas Hold'em poker but always wanted to try it? Our simple-to-follow tutorial mode will help you take the first steps. â€¢ NO REGISTRATIONÂ â€“ Get straight into the action. Choose guest mode to use our free casino app without registering. â€¢ SINGLE ACCOUNTÂ â€“ Play on different devices. Choose the authorization method that works best for you and start playing Texas Hold'em poker right away for free! Subscribe to our social media pages and be the first to find out about our promotions and latest news! Facebook: https://facebook.com/Pokerist Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pokeristclub YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/KamaGamesChannel X: https://x.com/KamaCasino This game is only available to users of legal age. The game offers no possibility of winning money or anything of value. Success in playing this game does not imply your success in a similar real-money casino game.
